questions_and_notes: For consistency and because it makes no difference, this and rivo-tavg-z0-hxy-x (rivo-Eday) should omit the "where directive".  Area-weighted regridding might not provide a very good representation of this field.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: Inflow of River Water into Cell
